targets.legendFormat: bytes of memory used for other runtime allocations

panels.description: shows how many heap objects are allocated. This is a counter value so you can use rate() to objects allocated/s.

panels.description: go_memstats_lookups_total – counts how many pointer dereferences happened. This is a counter value so you can use rate() to lookups/s.
panels.title: Rate of Pointer Dereferences
